title: Finger Makeup Sponge - Best Makeup Sponge 2017
text: By Roxanne Adamiyatt Feb 6, 2017 While there's little we haven't seen in the beauty world as of late, every once in awhile something comes along that really surprises us. The latest out-of-left-field offering? Foam finger makeup applicators. The Makeup Bullet Finger Sponge (as originally reported by Refinery29 ) was created by makeup artist Eva Jay to avoid the all too common blunder of dropping your beauty sponge. We've all been there when an inconvenient drop renders your tool unusable—lest you want to dab bacteria all over your face... Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A photo posted by The Makeup Bullet (@themakeupbullet) on Sep 24, 2016 at 12:40pm PDT Most Popular You just fit the sponge on one finger, wet or dry, then use it to apply and blend your foundation and concealer. Our favorite part is that it makes it 10x easier to reach every nook and cranny of the face—sides of the nose and inner corners of the eye, anyone? Talk about precision. A video posted by The Makeup Bullet (@themakeupbullet) on Feb 2, 2017 at 5:28am PST The Finger Sponge costs $14.95, or $24.95 for a pack of three, and is available on the-makeup-bullet.com .
